data.name: Kisekimura - ZumiIwa
data.detailed_description:
This DLC adds Skjema to the world of Kisekimura.

There's a tradition between barbarians and dragons that happens every generation, a challenge that could change the fate of the world. The dragons of the past agreed to stay in the Molten Peaks as long as they don't emerge victorious from a fight between two champions. The barbarians have consistently defeated the dragons for centuries. But this time, they pose a bigger threat than ever. Would Skjema, the barbarian champion, be able to stop them alone? Or would he need assistance to do so?

This DLC includes the following content:
  • 4 new CGI scenes drawn by ZumiIwa
  • A new playable character: Skjema
  • 10 new gems to equip
  • 6 new story missions
  • 2 additional missions

data.short_description: This DLC adds Skjema, new missions and gems to the world of Kisekimura.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8 or above
  • Processor: 4th gen Intel processor or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes:
Kisekimura features explicit nudity and sexual content. The option of fully disabling NSFW (Not Safe From Work, aka nudity/sexual content) is available in the game.

Every scene in the game is tagged so that the viewer may chose to disable specific content they may be sensitive to.
